section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
subsection: Other public or mixed entities, created by law whose purpose is to act in the public interest
goals__remit:
The Research Council of Norway is the national strategic and executive body for research and research-based innovation. The Research Council helps to meet 
society’s research needs by promoting and funding basic and applied research, as well as innovation, and promotes international research cooperation. The Research Council of Norway serves as an advisory body to the government on research policy.
